text:
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
OFFICE OF THE PRESIDENT
0 1
Station KUOM
University of Minnesota
Minneapolis l4, Minnesota
April 26, 1957
Mr. Frank Schooley
Station WILL-AM-FM-TV
University of Illinois
Dear Frank:
Should we schedule you for a brief report on Foundation Committee
activities at the NAJEB Luncheon Thursday noon. May 9?
What about reports on membership drives, publications or any other
activities over which you are currently riding herd?
Could you give me an answer by air mail with a carbon to Harry
Skornia?
Yours sincerely.
Burton Paulu
President
BP:rib
